001package com.github.sormuras.bach.command;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
004
005/**
006 * A command implementation for an arbitrary tool name taking arbitrary arguments.
007 *
008 * @param name The name of the command.
009 * @param additionals Aggregates additional command-line arguments.
010 */
011public record DefaultCommand(String name, AdditionalArgumentsOption additionals)
012    implements Command<DefaultCommand> {
013
014  public DefaultCommand(String name) {
015    this(name, AdditionalArgumentsOption.empty());
016  }
017
018  @Override
019  public DefaultCommand additionals(AdditionalArgumentsOption additionals) {
020    return new DefaultCommand(name, additionals);
021  }
022}
